format_related.description: This category includes words and phrases related to document formatting, data presentation, and layout design.

examples.definition: A set of type of one particular face and size.
A distinct section of a piece of writing, usually dealing with a single theme and indicated by a new line, indentation, or numbering.
A set of facts or figures systematically displayed, especially in columns and rows.
The way in which the parts of something are arranged or laid out.
The edge or border of something.
A line of text appearing at the top of each page of a book or document.
A small dot or other symbol used to mark items in a list.
A set of standards for the writing and design of documents, either for general use or for a specific publication, organization, or field.
A pre-designed document used as a starting point.
